data.title: Public Domain Media Search Engine Public Domain Image
authors: PICRYL - Public Domain Media Search Engine
data.meta_description: Download Image of Costanzo, Domenico de - Ferdinand IV of Naples and Maria Carolina of Austria. Free for commercial use, no attribution required.   Double-portrait of Ferdinand IV of Bourbon (1751-1825), King of Naples and his wife Queen Maria Carolina of Habsburg (1752-1814): he, in profile to the left in blue coat, red waistcoat, frilled cravat, wearing three breast-stars and a top hat in his powdered hair en queue; and she, in profile to the right in pale orange dress with blue stars and lace collar, blue scarf with gold tiara in her fair hair dressed in ringlets. Dated: 1700 - 1799. Topics: paintings, 1790 s portrait paintings from italy, 18th century portrait paintings of wedded couples of royalty, 18th century portrait paintings location missing, 18th century profile portrait paintings of men facing left, 18th century profile portrait paintings of women facing right, portrait miniatures of maria carolina of austria, portrait paintings of ferdinand i of the two sicilies, sold at christies, high resolution
